Create requests session using Selenium WebDriver cookies.

beforeStages.name: Navigate to the New Item Page.

steps.name: Go to the New Item Page by clicking New Item button.
Navigate to "NewItemPage"
Create new Pipeline project: "'Pipeline project'"
Enter "'Pipeline project'" in the "Item Name" field
Click "Pipeline" project
Click "OK" button
Click the button 'Save' to save "Pipeline project" project and go to project page
Scroll to element
Get the current page title
Get the page header text
Wait for the element to be visible
